website_summaries.verdict: An affordable all-purpose curved monitor for regular PC usage and gaming alike.
pros: Features a deep 1800R curve, vivid 3000:1 contrast ratio, energy saving mode, an ultra-slim design to maximize desk space, and a dedicated game mode
cons: Not fully optimized for gaming as Samsung’s pricier curved monitors

customer_reviews.title: this is a 3rd party seller that charges a restocking fre
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and is defective - refuses to connect to any devices, checked across different computers and cables, and spent hours with manual. Completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: meowmeow

customer_reviews.title: Needs adjusting out of the box but after that it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I was initially kind of worried because of the resolution, however, after tinkering with the setting and scaling down the size of the text, it really sharpened things up. It looks amazing now, and I don't have any buyers remorse. If you aren't happy in the beginning just try scaling down the text and changing the display mode on the monitor to find the one you like.
customer_reviews.author: Talon

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for typical work monitor
customer_reviews.text: Glossy monitor showed every reflection in the room. Way too glossy! Connected the monitor to my laptop, and text applications were blurry and I could not figure out better settings. Picture quality was fantastic for watching videos, but I needed this as an external monitor for work -- using word, excel, browsing and it ended up giving me a headache so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: DurhamTerp

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: I bought the monitor in Feb, it died in July. 6 months is a pretty short life for a monitor. I bought it for virtual reality mostly and it did work ok for that but for e-mail, spreadsheets, web surfing etc it is not good, things are distorted. I won't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Yez

customer_reviews.title: Great screen - text is a little fuzzy but good ...
customer_reviews.text: Great screen - text is a little fuzzy but good enough. Found the same monitor at Sam's for 219.00 - not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself a 4k monitor
customer_reviews.text: The text did not meet my expectations, it was blurry and i was not happy with the screen quality. It felt cheap to be honest. This model did not have sound either. I went with a 4k model and was happier
customer_reviews.author: Jay2002

customer_reviews.title: It came broken
customer_reviews.text: So let me say I love the monitor itself. My son already has one. He wanted a second one for christmas to add to his setup. Unfortunately when we received it there was a broken corner on the white plastic frame. Still planned on keeping it and just putting some epoxy on it. But then we turned it on and the opposite bottom corner glows lighter then the rest of the screen about a 2 inch square size. I contacted the seller and put the pictures here for them to see. I will update my review after they respond.
customer_reviews.author: iceman80

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor for the price!! Good quality and picture!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor for the price! I've had this monitor for at least a few months now and the quality is amazing. Some other reviews talk about not being able to watch video on the screen with high quality, I certainly beg to differ. I use this monitor for both my PC and to also watch streams, satellite TV, and high-def videos, all are amazingly displayed. The curve definitely allows you to view the entire screen, which is great for multi-tasking and gaming. I will soon replace my second monitor with another one of these soon!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!!  Curved is best!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant purchasing a curved monitor but I absolutely love it! It didn't take me long to adjust to the curve and I can't imagine ever going back to a flat screen again. If you are trying to decide if you want a curved monitor, I would say, take the leap! I absolutely love it. I actually noticed a difference in my gaming without any other upgrades. I would purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT monitor. I didn't realize what I was missing until I watched HD videos on You Tube using this monitor. Some reviews complain about poor text quality. I didn't find that to be the case at all and as an author good quality text on a monitor is very important to me. Text is fine. Maybe it is because I am using a high quality Asus video card. I am not sure, but this is a great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Bagne

customer_reviews.title: I simply love the curve on the display
customer_reviews.text: So when I first started reading about curve displays, I was like this is going to be like 3-D displays useless, but I have to say I am really impressed how just the slightest of curving makes a pleasant difference when you are using the monitor. Now, to put things in context, it is not world changing but enough that when I will buy my next TV I will defn look at ones with a curve. Colour is excellent and it is strong construction with the only taking a matter of minutes to assemble to the base. For the price I paid for it, well worth the cash.
customer_reviews.author: Kilmurry

customer_reviews.title: This is more of a TV than a Monitor but no speakers
customer_reviews.text: Max resolution is 1080p! I missed it in the spec. If you plan to use this as a work monitor for text you will be very disappointed. You get exactly what you pay for with this. If you want a 32" curve for office work spend more money for higher resolution. This a glorified TV without speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: good monitor, had to cover blinking light
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, the only thing is that the blue LED power light blinks and lights up my room some so i had to cover it with black tape.
customer_reviews.author: steve w

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this monitor because of the Samsung name
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my worst purchases ever. I bought a 24” monitor for one of my grandsons last Christmas. The initial problem arose when we first unpackaged the minitor. The monitor had a large bloom in across the vertical axis running from approximately 2”‘on from the left margin for approximately three inches in width up the entire vertical height of the monitor. The other problem was that the monitor wouldn’t accept a 1080 setting. In the long run, I decided to not waste my time or effort trying to to return the item to the vendor and the instead purchased a AOC monitor and the problem was resolved.
customer_reviews.author: BigFoot14

customer_reviews.title: White, curved and Samsung, what more could you want?
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor! Colors and vivid and details are awesome! Some pictures and videos make it look like you are looking through a window, not a monitor! This is a wonderful monitor, but not meant to be viewed by several ppl at once. Only one viewer. When you stand to the sides of it, screen looks a little hazy. But directly in front, perfect! Beautiful and white, stands out like no other!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Don't over pay.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using my screen for my FPV drone plane. The curved screen gives a real immersive feel. It's not as great as a 4K screen but I'm not using it for HD video the video feed is a 480p upscaled to 1080p. I'm not getting alot of motion blur so I'm pretty happy with this screen. The pixels are noticeable but only when you're up close. The plastic case is thin and feel cheap but it's light so it makes it easy to transport. I paid $208.99 for a new one so don't be fooled into paying more. It was a good buy at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors on this are vibrant & beautiful in 1080
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about Samsung screens that hasn't already been said. The colors on this are vibrant & beautiful in 1080. It's not 4k, but it's the next best thing. I debated on which to get, but for the size and depth of colors and a little savings on the money end, I'm quite happy with it and have no regrets. It is a little limited on ports, but the ones they have are well placed.
customer_reviews.author: SoulD

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with some issues
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor overall however after about 6 months started to black-out for no apparent reason. Samsung did not know what is wrong and offered me to send it for diagnostics. Using it as a second monitor for my laptop and can see that when this monitor blacks out the other one works just fine. It can be annoying if you are watching something but other than occasional black-outs it is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the design of the stand is worthless. The stand makes the monitor face downwards and it is already a curve. It is does have a shick design but not the best stand so that you can lift up the monitor it makes you look downward instead of eye level. Plus make sure that you do not want sound because the only way to get sound from this monitor is if you just a cord headset plug in... No one use cords anymore. Unfortunately I didn't pay attention that it does not have internal speakers until it was too late to return so don't make the same mistake. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and TWICE the screen arrived damaged! Would NEVER recommend this one.
customer_reviews.text: SUCH a disappointed child for his birthday, he was so patient for the second order to arrive and even that one was damaged! I can only attest it to the shape and material as to why it arrived totally unusable screen both times we attempted to attain this item! We were hopeful it was one company to ship that was in error but using another company and trying again to get this screen proved well that it is the actual item that is super frail. Terribly disappointed to have been humiliated twice giving this as a gift twice over and having it broken on arrival BOTH times.
customer_reviews.author: Bora International INC

customer_reviews.title: A 32" monitor with the footprint of a 27"
customer_reviews.text: This is 1900x1200, not 4k. While this is for work, where I have multiple windows open, have used for gaming of Skyrim and Fallout4 and am quite happy w/ the resolution, picture quality, refresh rate. I use two of these, though if I were going to game with a flying simulator would go for three. The curve allows for a slightly smaller footprint and has mounting holes for an ergo-arm. Only hmdi and display-port input, no VGA. Does have settings for muting brightness, called eye saving mode, which works nicely in a darken room.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for great price.
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say. It is bright, colors are brilliant. Having never owned or seen a curved screen i wondered what it would look like. Like I said, it is wonderful. Not having speakers is no problem as I use external speakers any way. The only negative comment is the lack of ability to tilt the monitor forward or backward.It is set for one angle and that's it. Which for me is perfect.I'm guesing if you mounted it on a wall or 'monitor rack; that would solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: looken16

customer_reviews.title: Screen defective on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed curved 32" monitor, easy to assemble and set up. Out of the box the screen was defective and showed a vertical black line from top to bottom when connected to 2 different computers (Mac) via either Mini Displayport or HDMI port. I called Samsung support (who only recommended to buy a new HDMI cable) and Amazon support who recommended a hard reset and also to try a new cable. I did all of the above but the defect remains, unfortunately the monitor will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Eastriver

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - bad resolution and very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for freelance graphic design and very disappointed. The screen resolution is so low that all text and lines look fuzzy. The monitor is also not very sturdy; it wiggles/wobbles every time I type or move my mouse on the desktop. I realize you get what you pay for, but honestly expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Artsyfartsygyrl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PS4
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor out there for gaming and work!! I was spectical before buying it thinking that it wont be compatible with my PS4, but OMG was i pleasantly surprised when I discovered that it actually was!! Games look amazing and fit to the whole screen size making them immersive and beautiful, currently playing horizon zero dawn! Same for work, you have enough screen space to have multiple applications up at the same time. If you are a coder, the IDEs like Intellij look more beautiful comoared to your boring work monitors and kinda makes you more productive!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Just a great deal for these fine monitors
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitors. Bought two for a side by side mounting. Looks terrific and picture colors and contrast is very good. Can't beat this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anderse

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I use this for complicated spread sheets and I just got tired of using magnifying glasses once the sheet was reduced to fit the screen. I don’t regret a thing. The brightness- I’m older an like the brighter display. Additionally, the supplier was super to work with when I accidentally ordered a lesser quality an wanted an upgrade. Response in minutes not hours.
customer_reviews.author: R. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality large monitor,  great price,  speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor in acceptance of the reality that working from home is a new reality and will be for a long while. I couldn't be happier with the product quality, the sleek, bright look of it, the image quality, and let's not forget, a bargain price for a highhigh-definition 32" curved screen. I was also pleased with the smooth and speedy delivery. I highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a beautiful quality monitor that doesn't cost you a fortune. I will buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Alain from San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: curve is good
customer_reviews.text: curve works well for me; I need reading glasses and also need glasses for see far away, so the curve keeps the focal depth generally constant. The resolution is very good for older software like CATIAv5 which uses fixed DPI fonts; with higher resolution the fonts are too small and the Windows cleartype merely makes fonts both fuzzy and larger.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming & movies only
customer_reviews.text: Let’s see. It’s a great monitor. More for movies, pictures and gaming. Text is kinda blurry. Not recommended for work/school IMO. The curve doesn’t bother me at all. Your eyes have to get used to it, but you can change the brightness and all. Also you can change the monitor to gamer mode in the setting menu. I love the gaming mode on here.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Leon

customer_reviews.title: Burn marks appeared, lines grew across the screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen, as time has gone on, has gotten worse and worse and worse. First these burn-like marks started to appear, and I tried to ignore it. Now a line has gone down the exact center of the screen like a giant scratch. More and more of the screen is going out. I should have rated low the moment it started. Not sure what I can do about it beyond just being out of all this money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Miller

customer_reviews.title: Can't Mount with Low Profile Mount
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great screen, but it's virtually impossible to remove the part of the base attached to the back of the screen. I wanted to have a thin profile mount on this screen but that part of the base is too large. I searched google and youtube etc and found some ways to remove it. It requires disassembling the casing, which I have tried numerous times to no avail. The frame around the screen is thin enough that all I did was end up cracking the frame around the screen. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mere

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dead
customer_reviews.text: Unable to Use, Monitor Would Not Work, Called Samsung Customer Service and Troubleshoot Problem Over the Phone, Only to Find out the Monitor was bad, Returning for Refund
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: It is really a big screen and it sometimes kinda looks like pixelated.
customer_reviews.text: If I had to buy another one again I would prefer a 27inch... It is really a big screen and it sometimes kinda looks like pixelated.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kercadó Morán

customer_reviews.title: The warranty really IS 3 years, despite what the warranty in the box says
customer_reviews.text: I verified this by calling Samsung at 800-726-7864. I gave them the model and SN and they gave me the information. I purchased this monitor because I recently had cataract surgery. The short of it is that I can focus on the screen easily if the screen is bright enough. My old monitors had turned a bit gray and yellow and using them was very difficult. This monitor is perfect at 87% of brightness!! It looks so good I bought a second monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Geek

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, but that stand!
customer_reviews.text: I deployed this monitor in an Open Air PB prototype. The monitor is beautiful, the curved screen adds a touch of elegance to the setup. That being said, what are thinking Samsung? You have to crack open the display to remove the desktop stand mount; f-me. Samsung claims it is wall-mountable; sure it is... it is if you are willing to disassemble the case to get to the screws to remove the stand. Since I have so much pull with Samsung (lol) how about a curved touchscreen??
customer_reviews.author: Dave in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only have this monitor for a couple weeks, so will write a review to update later, but so far I love it! Reading through the reviews after ordering it I was a little worried about how text would display on the screen but haven't had any of the problems others have reported. For me it was as easy as plug and play, no tinkering necessary. Maybe I just had the right tower and graphics card from the start. Either way, extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Curved is the way to go. Excellent monitor with Gaming Mode. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This monitor reminds me of being in a movie theater. Bright colors, yet easy on the eyes. Visuals are super configurable. Excellent detail, even at 1920 x 1080 HD. Has a Gaming Mode, as well. I won't ever go back to just a "flat panel" monitor, again. Definitely five out of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Plasmajam

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor at good price
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible curved monitor with a nice screen size for the price. It is bright and sharp. The colors look good, and view angles are also pretty good. The glossy white curved design is very attractive. However, the monitor itself takes a bit of getting used to. No ability to adjust the height, and reaching behind the monitor to change the input is not very convenient. Overall, it is a nice monitor at good price.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: If you came here for a better price cause you saw it has freesync somewhere else ...
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT HAVE FREESYNC. If you came here for a better price cause you saw it has freesync somewhere else (like I did) swerve, and find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Naruko

customer_reviews.title: stylish, great with mac, perfect for my new office
customer_reviews.text: Love it - it's super cute unlike a lot of monitors out there, plus this Amazon price is a STEAL. I paid like 225 when it was on promo and I couldn't be happier. It's not that great for tiny details if you want to put your face close to the monitor (not 4K) but for the price it's amazing. I like to work farther away and use it for my design work together with my Wacom tablet, and then use my macbook for internet browser and email and it's the perfect setup. Would buy again and 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Your Best monitor for reviewing your product coming out
customer_reviews.text: What this Monitor does is unbelievable. The color, the clarity, the congress of graphics and verbiage.....makes this the only Monitor to have in the workshop for my busy professionals. What you see on the Monitor is what you actually print and send via electronics. Precise and price friendly for small professional shops.
customer_reviews.author: Busy professional

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for more than just PC...
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike was the fact that there is no sound (but I solved that with my computers older speakers). Other than that, this computer is 1,000 times better than what I thought it would be, I’m impressed. Was a little skeptical about paying so much for a computer screen at first, but once I got it set up I was so happy that I made this choice. The quality is so excellent that I’ve ditched my tv and have been using it for a gaming set up for a few days, rather than using it for my computer. (Side note: Make sure the PC is set to 1080 Or HD resolution before you say the quality is horrible).
customer_reviews.author: Kayli

customer_reviews.title: Nice curved look however quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these monitors a year and a half ago. They were easy to setup and have met my needs. However today I noticed 2 of the 3 have cracked at the bottom right edge of the screen in the exact same place. The monitors are installed in environments that do not see traffic and are protected so the damage did not come from contact but poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like you are in the game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it! It's got a great immersive feel to it. She uses it primarily for gaming (WoW) In a dark room sitting fairly close, it feels like you are in the action. While it was okay in normal mode, turning on gaming mode seemed to add some depth in games; although it makes normal web pages seem a bit washed out. This is being run through a GTX970 with a HDMI cable. I'd highly recommend to a gamer looking for a great curved monitor on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: JohnK

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors.
customer_reviews.text: Lack of monitor options, these are clearly not meant for gaming, however capable, it comes with a gaming mode which dynamically adjusts contrast and mimics HDR. But you cannot customize each setting for that. It's mainly designed for office work and probably some studio work. It's an ips panel, it's meant for color accuracy, this one in particular, not for gaming. But still, it's not bad. I game on these much better than I did with regular tv's. I recommend if you are not into hardcore gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Received monitor and does not work at all, not ...
customer_reviews.text: Received monitor and does not work at all, not even a back light. Will be returning and will update review once it is replaced satisfactorily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 11 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this monitor a lot until it just stopped working. Currently it will stay on for about 5 minutes and then the screen goes black. To fix it, I power cycle the monitor on and off which lasts about 5 minutes. This was an expensive monitor and it is disappointing it lasts less than a year. Side note, the stand is not detachable so it cant be wall mounted without the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M

customer_reviews.title: Not Steady and bad display pixel resolution
customer_reviews.text: It is very shaky. The load doesn't balance out properly, maybe because of a small stand and because of which it doesn't stay steady and constantly shakes for a very minor disturbance on the table like keyboard tapping. Also, the display resolution is horrible. If you are planning to buy an ultra-wide monitor like this, go for higher resolution than this.
customer_reviews.author: Saketh Mahankali

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: my computer screen had a large defect in it and the side of the monitor was broken/cracked
customer_reviews.author: a. gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great monitor. I wanted a larger monitor and for the money this was the best option I could find. Is it the ulitmate? No. But for the price point this a great monitor. Crisp and good color. Works well. A great edition to the computer set. Plus, the slim bezel and nice stand and color make for a nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Narut Ujnat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake initially not knowing my video card doesn’t have a hdmi plug. Had to quickly order an adapter. Once that showed up we were in business! I’ve never dealt with a curved screen before but it has definitely grown on me. This screen is pretty massive... at first I kind of regretted it but now I love it. This is a great device with really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Oetken

customer_reviews.title: you have options
customer_reviews.text: I had a 32 in LG white tv $119 from best buy prior to purchasing this monitor with clear crispy clear picture ....This monitor for some reason is not crispy clear not sure if it's pixels or resolution the curved is the only thing part i like do to style ...i was better off with LG White TV monitor ....
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is super bright and has a nighttime dimming app
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is super bright and has a nighttime dimming app. Good price and helps with my aging eyes. I had to order it three times as they kept sending the item that did not have a VESA mount which I needed for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Ohioan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color and sharpness for reading and gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this monitor up after trying out the Spectre, I immediately returned the spectre when it showed up as it was really poor quality picture, but this Samsung 32 is bad-ass. Especially for the price, everything I look at is crisp with great color distinction. The price is really great since most like this are over 300$. The spectre was 180 and I thought I had gone back in time 20 years in terms of picture quality. You will be very happy with it. Just FYI there are no speakers, but I didn't need them.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but Problems and Total Failures
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks nice, modern, and was an attractive price Unfortunately the entire ownership experience has been plagued. It worked for less than 2 months until the monitor went completely black. After hours of troubleshooting and working with tech support, they accepted the repair work order. The product was shipped back and returned in less than 2 weeks (pretty good). However, after only 20 minutes the monitor blacks out every 10 seconds for roughly 3 seconds at a time. Back to tech support. Working from home, reliability is the most important feature and this product's repeated failures has me questioning Samsung's quality / reputation, despite numerous other flawless TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Weidman

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice to have such a hugh curved monitor but there ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice to have such a hugh curved monitor but there is a great glare issue. It has GREAT GLARE! Nice at night and early hours though. I won't be going back to my old 22.5 or what ever it it is. I paid only $250 and feel like it was a good deal. Maybe i will arrange it to a better non-glare location in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a good monitor, for a decent price you found it. Our very old monitor was needing an upgrade. I didn't want to break the bank. I found this one, bought it. My wife is very, very happy with this monitor. Its "wife approved" so to speak. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this monitor for streaming tv and movies and regular computing for home. Currently, I am using my laptop to connect to my monitor. I knew that the monitor was 4k picture quality so I ordered a QGeeM Multifunctional Converter to make the best use of the monitor's capabilities- it worked! The picture is amazing! The delivery was extremely fast for me also!
customer_reviews.author: Gerold Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Large Screen & Beautiful Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is huge on my tiny desk, but such a beauty. I've been using it all day and am loving it so far! The brightness is very easy to adjust. I connected it to my Macbook via HDMI and closed the laptop. I use it with my USB mouse and keyboard and it works great! I plan to use this with my work laptop for remote projects too. I tested out side by side windows and it's got the same feel as a dual monitor workstation setup but on a single large screen instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not so good as the picture wasn't as clear as the monitor we replaced. Stylish, but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is there a way to do 10 stars?
customer_reviews.text: Because this is the most beautiful monitor I've ever had. It's not too matte so the picture is crisp, but it's not too glossy that light is distracting. It's just amazing. Worth every penny. I'm honestly surprised that I was able to find something so awesome in my price range
customer_reviews.author: Person with a name

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the low price-point this is a great monitor. Service was excellent— I received my first shipment cracked, dropped it off at Kohl’s, and received a replacement in a matter of days. The reason I gave 4 stars out of 5 is because Ive had issues connecting any Bluetooth device to the monitor (defaults to the monitor for output after a matter of minutes and eventually stopped connecting altogether.) and because the picture quality could be a little better. Again, for the price point I feel the image/clarity is satisfactory but if you’re looking for something super sharp you’re probably better off spending the extra money for a 4K monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Dame Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for work. Watched a couple of videos and played some games on it. I’m not a gamer but the picture looked good. I bought it to replace my 2 19 inch monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Moral

customer_reviews.title: The resolution is low for a computer but is great for PS4. The included stand is ass cheeks.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was super easy and the picture is great. I have it set to eye saver mode for when its connected to my laptop. The resolution is low for 1080p so if that matters to you then this isn't the monitor for you. The stand that is included is so bad. It is plastic and flimsy, doesn't adjust, and when you put two next to each other they don't look level (the top corners of the monitors meet where the bottoms do not, making an A shape). The monitor is VESA compliant so problem solved there. The product lost a star due to the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Silent Mike

customer_reviews.title: 1950 quality Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality for everything! Documents are showing lots of gray and the lines from the screen. This screen is straight from the 1950s!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for work. I wasn't expecting much as the price was 259.99 and this thing is huge for a monitor. The picture is amazing. Yea you can get a better picture for 3 times the money with a 4k but I didn't want to upgrade my video card. I would recommend this monitor if you want a nice clean image. The curve gives it just enough pop that it doesn't hurt your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Podsy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks before reviewing. This new monitor is everything I expected for my desktop. I use readers when reading, and I really didn’t want to have to use them while looking at my monitor. My monitor is set away from my keyboard and it works great. Sharp, crisp, clear picture. Easy to set up and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this thing, the price is great. Picture just takes a little adjusting for the text.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure people would complain about certain aspects of this thing but for me, an average guy who likes to play games occasionally and works on music for the most part... it’s awesome! I love it. Amazing price for a very large and immersive experience.
customer_reviews.author: BadNraD

customer_reviews.title: Really slick monitor for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for over a year now and I really enjoy it. Basically acts as my TV since I do all of my streaming through my laptop which is hooked up to this monitor. If you're doing simple things such as running a web browser or coding with the monitor the picture is super crisp. If you're streaming movies or shows sometime the image can become a bit pixelated/fuzzy but it's rare and I'm sure it has more to do with my internet than anything. Overall I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Liked the large size and brightness and price, but the max resolution is insufficient (looks fuzzy)and the curve made me nauseous. Things in straight line look curved. Has no ability to tilt or raise/lower, and has only two ports, and feels flimsy. USB ports would be helpful. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: RDCC-ZG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for multi-tasking and 60+ eyes
customer_reviews.text: I always have multiple windows open at the same time for doing work. I've very please with the quality, picture, features and text! Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Chemaster

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this LED monitor. As a matter of fact, I prefer to watch 95% of my movies/videos on this monitor as opposed to my 55" OLEG TV screen. Just saying I'm extremely pleased. Oh, and I often use my headphones and I feel as though I'm at a cinema.
customer_reviews.author: Rick T.

customer_reviews.title: Curve feature good for the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the curved feature, plus the 32-inch size. I use it as my main computer screen. For reading, it's fine. My dislike is the fact that the images aren't sharp enough. The brightness is okay, but watching any live-action videos, etc., leaves something to be desired. Other than that, I'm satisfied with the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer, Yes

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The resolution is fair but the stand is rigid and is pointing down! This monitor does not have the option to add an arm or even then it up/down or left/right. I will need to buy a stand to just have the monitor upper and don't bother the fact that is facing down.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love the monitor. I use it for Flight Simulation mostly. I have only one gripe and thats the speaker hook up in the Monitor. Took me a bit of time to deactivate that so I could use the Comms in the Sim. It Looks great and it sounds great as long as you do not need to have Voice, it's just irrating turning off for headset/turning on for movies and such.
customer_reviews.author: Gene C.

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this monitor
customer_reviews.text: He likes to work with multiple windows open / multiple applications. He's bought a couple of these over the last year & is super happy with them. While I'm rarely at his desk, I find them to display images cleanly with excellent color and no issues with glare.
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I removed my old two 21" monitors before and upgraded to this monitor. The change in colors and video quality was a big plus. Bigger screen seem to be a bit more productive as I was able to see my excel workbooks more clearly. Will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible resolution
customer_reviews.text: I can't use this for reading text. I've tried messing around with the settings but the image is terrible. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Whitebelt

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use and an external monitor with an Apple laptop. It is "OK". Pretty mediocre resolution and color. I guess i'd say it is OK for the money, but if i had to do it again, I'd spend more for a higher quality picture.
customer_reviews.author: J Dingo

customer_reviews.title: I have 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and I love them. They will probably be the last monitors I need to buy. I work from home so having multiple screens for work is a must for me. Thes fit and look great. I don't game online so I can't speak to that, but they work slick for design and development.
customer_reviews.author: imJack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent graphics
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding clarity, large screen. I love mine so much that when COVID-19 made it necessary for many to either work from home or face furloughs, I ordered a second for my step-daughter to set up a home office. She loves hers too. And so will you.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a great monitor at a great price. I'm not a huge gamer but I do write a lot and do research online, works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C Gorr

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor! Don't Hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up during prime day. #1 - Great aesthetics. It looks great with my office setup. #2 - Great 1080p color display. Without touching the monitor settings, the colors on my windows 10 machine were perfect. Configured my OSX machine to make the colors more vibrant. #3 - No scaling issues. Some reviews complained about text scaling, I had no issues, a straight plug and play. #4 - Sturdy monitor stand.
customer_reviews.author: wagent0sh

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.text: Going from a 24" flat screen monitor to this 32" curved monitor is refreshing. The larger curved display is great and kind of brings you into it. It's very pleasing to the eye, not too sure about curved TV's, but sitting right in front of this 32" curved monitor is great! I would definitely recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M.

customer_reviews.title: Broken product, bad lifetime. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product, and it was broken. Both corners are broken. I can't get a replacement since it was used and broken. I will have to wait weeks after buying this to hopefully be reimbursed then buy a proper monitor. I've seen bad reviews with these monitors not lasting long also. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No USB, can't adjust height or angle
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd done more research. I just kind of assumed a monitor this price would have USB-C and an adjustable mount. Ordering an HDMI to USB-C adapter and hoping I like the screen, height, and angle when it gets here...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Believe me this monitor is sucks for daytime uses. The whites are nt white, not bright, and not sharp. Even the texts are blurry. Can’t return and can’t use. Bought two and has to sell cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: ns branding

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality & resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Monitor. Large, yes. However the picture quality and resolution are terrific. I am able to change brightness high and low with no lapse in quality. Just gave a lower star on gaming, because I don't do a lot of famung
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the size is exactly what I wanted. Amazon got them here very fast after the other two were damaged in transit. It comes in 3 pieces and very easy to put together that a newbie could do it.
customer_reviews.author: TME

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is jealous of my monitor at work
customer_reviews.text: I can't count the number of co-workers who've asked me about my monitor. It's just like the one sold at Costco but this one has the VESA mount which is a deal breaker for me. The perfect balance of quality, design, and price.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: DEAD DEAD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product July, 2017. I did not start using it until late 2017. This monitor lasted with barely a year of use. It is dead as of 12/31/18. While the picture was great, who want to replace a monitor every year? I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: theresa jorgens

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for wife who was going to be spending a lot more time on the computer due to Covid quarantine. She likes it a lot. Not too bright. Good clarity. So nice to have two pages side-by-side and not have to squint.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first curved monitor and I love it. I have had Samsung monitors for several years. It has everything I was looking for-large screen, sharp picture, easy setup. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a new monitor. I use it for gaming, everyday computing and it fulfills all my requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for productivity and gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for productivity and gaming...and it's stylish. I'll never know how I ever survived without a 32 inch curved monitor.
customer_reviews.author: sirkenneth

customer_reviews.title: amazing, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far .... amazing, especially for the price! I bought this to replace an old Dell 20inch that I was using as a second monitor with my laptop. As an application developer, there is no longer a need for dual monitors as this gives me plenty of space to have multiple windows open at once without hiding any of them!
customer_reviews.author: Billi Dee

customer_reviews.title: This is a great monitor for our home office
customer_reviews.text: We have used this monitor now in our home office for almost three months. Between my wife and I, it averages about 3 hours a day of use. We do not use it to play games, so I can't comment on that aspect. We love it for Word, Excel, Access, web browsing, and remote commuting. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: cheaper than best buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor for my husband’s Christmas present. He loved it and won’t stop playing WOW. Frame rate is 4ms. This monitor was better quality than anything the same size I would have purchased at best buy. The package shipped faster than expected and was in perfect condition. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: JOE R.

customer_reviews.title: ... as my second monitor to my Macbook Air and love it. I do a lot of Excel work ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this as my second monitor to my Macbook Air and love it. I do a lot of Excel work and have not had any issues with visibility or resolution which I had been a little concerned about after reading other reviews. Have had it for a couple months and love it.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Solid monitor ....
customer_reviews.text: Solid monitor - bright no dead pixels in the two I purchased 6 months apart - only annoying thing is it has one toggle switch which controls all the functions - hence - when you sleep your PC - it’s a pain to turn off ...
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Gypsy

product_meta.title: Samsung 32 inch CF391 Curved Monitor (LC32F391FWNXZA) - 1080p, Dual Monitor, Laptop Monitor, Monitor Stand/Riser/Mount Compliant, AMD Freesync, Gaming, HDMI, White
product_meta.description: 1800R curved monitor with 3000:1 contrast ratio provides a truly immersive viewing experience on a beautiful 32” screen. Featuring a glossy white design, the monitor boasts Game Mode technology which allows users to enjoy smooth images, even during the fastest moving scenes. With HDMI and Display Port inputs, you can easily connect any of your peripherals to enjoy on this Samsung monitor.
feature_bullets: 1800R curvature of the screen provides a truly immersive viewing experience

An ultra-slim and sleek profile that measures less than 05 inch thick The simple circular stand will add a modern look to your space. Product Dimensions With Stand- 28.5 x 20.6 x 9.8 Inches. Product Dimensions Without Stand- 28.5 x 16.9 x 3.7 Inches
Game Mode technology which allows you to enjoy smooth images, even during the fastest moving scenes. Power Consumption (Stand-by) Less than 0.3Watt
Experience vibrant, stunningly vivid colors with Samsung's Active Crystal Color technology The excellent 5000:1 contrast ratio delivers deep blacks and bright whites
Energy Saving Plus reduces screen brightness to save power, plus the screen brightness automatically transitions fluidly—reducing energy use even more. Windows Compatible:Yes. Mac Compatible
